alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:18PM EDT until July 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Charlotte County in southwestern Florida... Northern Lee County in southwestern Florida... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 617 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Babcock Ranch, or 18 miles northwest of Labelle, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Babcock Ranch, Babcock Webb Wma, Olga, Fort Myers Shores, and North Fort Myers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
